zone.line: Which wraps me, like an atmosphere of light
And bears me as a cloud is borne by its own wind
The Moon
Brother mine, calm wanderer
Happy globe of land & air
is darted like a beam from
Some Spirit wraps thine atmosphere & thee
Which penetrates my frozen frame
And passes with the warmth of flame--
With love & odour & deep melody
Through me, through me!--
The Earth
Ha, ha,! the cavens of my hollow mountains
My cloven fire-crags, sound-exulting fountains
Laugh with a vast & inextinguishable laug
hter
The Oceans & the Desarts & the Abysses
measured
Of the deep air's unfathomed wildernesses
all
Answer from their clouds & billows, echoing after
They cry aloud as I do-- Sceptered Curse
Who all our green & azure Universe
